verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Naisafisha njia (mimi) –
njia iendayo Mbinguni. x2
Nilikoahidiwa (mimi) –
makao ya milele mimi.
Naisafisha njia –
njia iendayo Mbinguni.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Tena - Sina wasiwasi,
wala - hofu ndani ya moyo.
Kwa kuwa - ninayo ramani,
ramani ya mbinguni.
Tena – ninapoisoma,
hii ramani ya mbinguni.
Nakiri – nitauona,
upendo wa Mungu kwangu.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Asante Bwana Mungu –
(aee) aee (aee) aee (aee)
Kwa kunipenda mimi –
ae ee aeee aee
Ukanipa ramani –
(aee) aee (aee) aee (aee)
Ramani iniongoze inifikishe
uliko ee Mungu wangu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Asante Bwana Yesu -
(aee) aee (aee) aee (aee).
Kwa kunipenda mimi -
ae ee aeee aee.
Ukaja duniani -
(aee) aee (aee) aee (aee).
Ili tu unikomboe unitoe
utumwani mwake shetani.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Asante Roho mtakatifu -
(aee) aee (aee) aee (aee).
Kwa kunipenda mimi -
ae ee aeee aee.
Kwani huniongoza -
(aee) aee (aee) aee (aee).
Katika hii safari kuelekea
mbinguni kwa Mungu Baba.
